title: Ticket #265: When giving up on ckpt, reset related attrs
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

In the old shadow, if we are unable to communicate with the ckpt server that holds the job's image we eventually decide to just start over. In that case, we should update the ckpt-related job ad attributes to reflect this.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (15).
